description: It all begins from the day I play the role as seekasia hackathon committee. We have decided to create a single page application for our co-worker to view the latest information. After considering all the options, I have decided to put the website at [seekasia-hackathon-2015.github.io](http://seekasia-hackathon-2015.github.io), after review done we will then move the files to [seekasia website](http://www.seekasia.com/hackathon2015/).
title: Seek Asia Hackathon 2015 website
